attributes.action: count a "none vote" in an election as a vote of no confidence in the political process?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know that barring a few exceptional circumstances this is true anyway, but I believe that it should be officially recognised in elections. We could start with the dropping of the word "mandate" from politics unless it can be proved that not all none voters would have voted for the party that finished second or that it would not affected the election if they had.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
